import React from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createMatch } from '../actions' class MatcherProfile extends React.Component { clickHandler = () => { this.props.createMatch } render() { return ( // !this.props.selectedUser ?

) } } const mapStateToProps = state => { return { currentUser: state.auth.currentUser, selectedUser: state.users.selectedUser } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, { createMatch })(MatcherProfile)
